languages.text: "Нас всех ждет расплата, рано или поздно. Мы можем лишь молиться Ему, что сможем заплатить эту цену, когда придет время".

traits.locale_text: "Нас всех ждет расплата, рано или поздно. Мы можем лишь молиться Ему, что сможем заплатить эту цену, когда придет время".

languages.text: "Sooner or later, we all will. We can only pray to Him that we will be able to pay the price when our time comes."
languages.original_text: "Нас всех ждет расплата, рано или поздно. Мы можем лишь молиться Ему, что сможем заплатить эту цену, когда придет время".

traits.locale_text: "Sooner or later, we all will. We can only pray to Him that we will be able to pay the price when our time comes."
"Sooner or later, we all will. We can only pray to Him that we will be able to pay the price when our time comes."
"Sooner or later, we all will. We can only pray to Him that we will be able to pay the price when our time comes."
"Sooner or later, we all will. We can only pray to Him that we will be able to pay the price when our time comes."
"Sooner or later, we all will. We can only pray to Him that we will be able to pay the price when our time comes."
"Sooner or later, we all will. We can only pray to Him that we will be able to pay the price when our time comes."

languages.text: “我们每个人都会付出代价，不过是迟早的问题。我们只能向神皇祈祷，希望清算到来的时候，我们有能力付出这样的代价。”
languages.original_text: "Sooner or later, we all will. We can only pray to Him that we will be able to pay the price when our time comes."

traits.locale_text: “我们每个人都会付出代价，不过是迟早的问题。我们只能向神皇祈祷，希望清算到来的时候，我们有能力付出这样的代价。”

languages.text: 「そのうち、私達は全員そうなる。もしその時が来たら代償を支払うことができるよう、主に祈るしかない」
languages.original_text: "Sooner or later, we all will. We can only pray to Him that we will be able to pay the price when our time comes."

traits.locale_text: 「そのうち、私達は全員そうなる。もしその時が来たら代償を支払うことができるよう、主に祈るしかない」

languages.text: «Tarde o temprano todos lo haremos. Lo único que podemos hacer es rezarle para que seamos capaces de pagar el precio cuando nos llegue el momento».
languages.original_text: "Sooner or later, we all will. We can only pray to Him that we will be able to pay the price when our time comes."

traits.locale_text: «Tarde o temprano todos lo haremos. Lo único que podemos hacer es rezarle para que seamos capaces de pagar el precio cuando nos llegue el momento».

languages.text: "Früher oder später werden wir das alle. Wir können nur zum Imperator beten, dass wir in der Lage sind, den Preis zu bezahlen, wenn unsere Zeit gekommen ist."
languages.original_text: "Sooner or later, we all will. We can only pray to Him that we will be able to pay the price when our time comes."

traits.locale_text: "Früher oder später werden wir das alle. Wir können nur zum Imperator beten, dass wir in der Lage sind, den Preis zu bezahlen, wenn unsere Zeit gekommen ist."

languages.text: « Nous paierons tous, tôt ou tard. Nous ne pouvons que prier l'Empereur pour qu'il nous permette de racheter nos crimes quand le moment viendra. »
languages.original_text: "Sooner or later, we all will. We can only pray to Him that we will be able to pay the price when our time comes."

traits.locale_text: « Nous paierons tous, tôt ou tard. Nous ne pouvons que prier l'Empereur pour qu'il nous permette de racheter nos crimes quand le moment viendra. »

languages.text: "Er ya da geç hepimiz öderiz. Tek yapabileceğimiz O'na dua etmek ve o gün geldiğinde bedeli ödeyebilecek durumda olmak."
languages.original_text: "Sooner or later, we all will. We can only pray to Him that we will be able to pay the price when our time comes."

traits.locale_text: "Er ya da geç hepimiz öderiz. Tek yapabileceğimiz O'na dua etmek ve o gün geldiğinde bedeli ödeyebilecek durumda olmak."
